name: Late Night: Chapter 1 - The Office
description:
After working for Glass and Schlatt insurance for years one claim in particular caught David's attention. A life insurance claim for one Mr.Wilkirson, David's research may grant him more insight than he can handle.

This is my first finished project! Let me know what you think. Should we find out more about David's research or should his story end here. I hope you enjoy and thank you for playing.

10/28/21 Update:

-Fixed grammar issues

-Fixed formatting issues caused by grammar fixes

-Improved hitboxes on certain objects to make them easier to interact with
